abstract: NBA Roundup; New Orleans Pelicans defeat New York Knicks, 99-91; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jrue Holiday returned from a toe injury to score 22 points for host New Orleans while Carmelo Anthony had 22 for the Knicks.

headline.main: Pelicans Beat Knicks to End 3-Game Skid
headline.print_headline: Pelicans Beat Knicks to End 3-Game Skid

snippet: Jrue Holiday returned from a toe injury to score 22 points for host New Orleans while Carmelo Anthony had 22 for the Knicks.
